metadata.title: CVE-2024-0745 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: The WebAudio `OscillatorNode` object was susceptible to a stack bufferoverflow. This could have led to a potentially exploitable crash. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 122.

criterions.comment: firefox package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs102 package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
